SELECT MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE_ID ,
MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.KUBUN , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.COUNT ,
MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.DELETE_FLAG , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.SEND_FLAG , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.VESSEL_ID , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.DATA_NO , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.USER_KEY , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.RENEW_DATE , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.TS
FROM MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE
WHERE MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE( MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE_ID ,
KUBUN , MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , COUNT ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE_ID ,
:KUBUN , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , :COUNT ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE SET KUBUN = :KUBUN , MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID = :MS_CARGO_GROUP_ID , COUNT = :COUNT ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE_ID = :MS_BOARDING_EXPERIENCE_ID AND TS = :TS
